description:
Upgrade your hydration game and conquer the trails knowing that staying quenched is one thing you never have to worry about.

  • Made of durable TPU with welded seams that are 100% BPA and PVC free for peace of mind on the trail
  • Plug-N-Play® connect system to disconnect the tube for super easy refills
  • Insulated reservoir and drink tube keep fluids at an ideal temperature for longer
  • High-flow bite valve self-seals to eliminate dripping
  • Flexible, non-kinking 91.5 cmdrink tube provides a steady flow
  • Internal drying tab creates a complete cleaning and drying solution for after your trip
name: Ultimate Direction Reservoir
